LanguageData.ClutterWoodTileA.label: dark wood tiles
LanguageData.ClutterWoodTileA.description: Dark wood panels with a dark border around each tile. Beauty: 2.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor2.label: brown wood floor
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor2.description: Thin vertical brown planks. For that warm homey feeling. Beauty: 3.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor4.label: styled wood floor
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor4.description: Three small planks per tile that alternate from horizontal to vertical every other tile. Reddish brown in color. Beauty: 3.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor5.label: brown wood planks
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor5.description: Vertical medium sized planks with staggered joints. Brown in color. Beauty: 4.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor6.label: tan wood planks
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor6.description: Medium sized planks in a horizontal pattern with a tanned wood look. Beauty: 4.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor3.label: light wood planks
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor3.description: Staggered joint, light colored wood flooring in short, horizontal planks. Beauty: 3.
LanguageData.ParquetFloor.label: parquet
LanguageData.ParquetFloor.description: Herringbone flooring. Regal elegance for the sophisticated colonist. Takes some time to build. Beauty: 3.
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor.label: oak planks
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor.description: Unfinished oak. Long horizontal planks with a light coloring. Beauty: 3.
